document.full_text: university of san diego president mary e. lyons said she has 'unwavering support' for men's basketball coach bill grier and athletic director ky snyder as the fbi investigates.
document.title: usd president expresses support for coach, ad
lines_and_colors: university of san diego president mary e. lyons said she has 'unwavering support' for men's basketball coach bill grier and athletic director ky snyder as the fbi investigates.
